description: The Irish Minister for Foreign Affairs said that 50,000 people a week were still leaving the country.
title: Coronavirus: Irish government urges public to 'holiday at home'
title_page: Coronavirus: Irish government urges public to 'holiday at home' - BBC News
maintext: He also said a call centre is being set up to make sure everyone who comes into Ireland gets a follow up call to ensure they are where they say they are and have good advice.
